Canvas Width.description: Width of drawable area in mm

Canvas Height.description: Height of drawable area in mm

Canvas Margin Top.description: Vertical distance from motor pulleys to the top of the canvas in mm

Width Pulley to Pulley.description: Distance from pulley center to pulley center in mm

Interpolation Distance.description: Maximum distance gondola will travel before recalculating trajectory to final x,y destination

Steps Per mm.description: Motor steps per mm of belt movement

Left Motor Direction.description: Direction of Left motor to lower the gondola. 1:clockwise, -1: counterclockwise

Right Motor Direction.description: Direction of Right motor to lower the gondola. 1:clockwise, -1: counterclockwise

Left State Machine Base Pin.description: GPIO Pin connected to Left stepper motor driver (ULN2003) Pin 1

Right State Machine Base Pin.description: GPIO Pin connected to Right stepper motor driver (ULN2003) Pin 1

Left State Machine Number.description: Index for state machine controlling Left motor

Right State Machine Number.description: Index for state machine controlling Right motor
